Room.Name: Fletching Room
Room.ShortDescription: You are in a the archery tackle and fletching room of Castle Ragnar.
Room.LongDescription: Master bowyers are at work on long benches, busy making strong yew bows and fletching war arrows. A group of apprentices carry great armloads of arrows to the storage room through the passage. In one corner a mage works with one of the bowyers, waving a black wand over a stack of newly made crossbows. The main armory is through the arch to the east. There is a practice range for archers on the south side.
